definition[0]: someone or something that is not what they are claimed to be – used to show disapproval
example[0]: The elections were a complete sham.
definition[1]: when someone tries to make something or someone seem better than they really are
example[1]: It all turned out to be sham and hypocrisy.
definition[2]: a cover for a pillow, especially one used for decoration
definition[3]: made to appear real in order to deceive people
definition[4]: to pretend to be upset, ill etc to gain sympathy or an advantage
example[3]: She’s not ill, she’s only shamming.
